SEARCH
Package gw.commons.metadata.i18n.config

Interface IGWLocale

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<IGWLocale>, ILocale
public interface IGWLocale extends ILocale, Comparable<IGWLocale>
This is the public interface for GWLocale, which is defined in the configuration file.
